full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DI NI, PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI 'DON CHA MI GSAL BA RNAMS DER GANG GANG GSANG BA LTAR NGAG 'DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI, GROGS MCHED DAM PA AER KHE DAR HAN GNYER BA'I DON DU, GNAS LNGA RIGS PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJE NYID KYI GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING BSGYUR BA'O, ,)
